metadata.title: CVE-2016-1246 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Buffer overflow in the DBD::mysql module before 4.037 for Perl allowscontext-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) viavectors related to an error message.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1246` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libdbd-mysql-perl - 4.025-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libdbd-mysql-perl package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.025-1ubuntu0.1').
